summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of each side of First Avenue South, in the City of Seattle, from the north margin of Holgate Street to the north margin of Atlantic Street, by constructing a sewer therein, of proper dimensions and material, with all wyes, openings, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewering and draining of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1362 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
